an4.176:4.1: * “Saddho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṃ sammā āyācamāno āyāceyya:
an4.176:4.3: Esā, bhikkhave, tulā etaṃ pamāṇaṃ mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ, yadidaṃ sāriputtamoggallānā.
an4.176:5.1: Saddhā, bhikkhave, bhikkhunī evaṃ sammā āyācamānā āyāceyya:
an4.176:5.2: ‘tādisā homi yādisā khemā ca bhikkhunī uppalavaṇṇā cā’ti.
an4.176:5.3: Esā, bhikkhave, tulā etaṃ pamāṇaṃ mama sāvikānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ, yadidaṃ khemā ca bhikkhunī uppalavaṇṇā ca.
an4.176:6.1: Saddho, bhikkhave, upāsako evaṃ sammā āyācamāno āyāceyya:
an4.176:6.2: ‘tādiso homi yādiso citto ca gahapati hatthako ca āḷavako’ti.
an4.176:6.3: Esā, bhikkhave, tulā etaṃ pamāṇaṃ mama sāvakānaṃ upāsakānaṃ, yadidaṃ citto ca gahapati hatthako ca āḷavako.
an4.176:7.1: * Saddhā, bhikkhave, upāsikā evaṃ sammā āyācamānā āyāceyya:
an4.176:7.2: ‘tādisā homi yādisā khujjuttarā ca upāsikā veḷukaṇḍakiyā ca nandamātā’ti.
an4.176:7.3: Esā, bhikkhave, tulā etaṃ pamāṇaṃ mama sāvikānaṃ upāsikānaṃ, yadidaṃ khujjuttarā ca upāsikā veḷukaṇḍakiyā ca nandamātā”ti.
